headline: Lowe's: Tariffs And Renewed Inflation To Hamper Home Improvement Demand
summary: Lowe's Q4 earnings report is crucial, with analysts expecting an EPS of $1.83 and $18.25B in sales amid a negative trend. Read why I remain bearish on LOW stock.

headline: Lowe's Companies, Inc. to Host Fourth Quarter & Fiscal 2024 Earnings Conference Call on Feb. 26
summary: MOORESVILLE, N.C., Feb. 19, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Lowe's Companies, Inc. announced today that it will hold its Fourth Quarter & Fiscal 2024 Earnings Conference Call at 9 a.m. Eastern time on...
